001package net.tvburger.jdl.knn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances.Metrics;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
009
010public class KnnMain {
011
012    public static void main(String[] args) {
013        NearestNeighbors nearestNeighbors = new NearestNeighbors(3, Metrics.euclidean(), new UniformWeighting());
014
015        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<Float> sinus = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(10.0f, (float) Math.PI * 2, JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
016        DataSet<Float> dataSet = sinus.load();
017        DataSet<Float> trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
018        DataSet<Float> validationSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
019        NearestNeighborsPreparer regime = new NearestNeighborsPreparer();
020        Trainer<NearestNeighbors, Float> nearestNeighborsTrainer = Trainer.of(null, null, null, regime);
021        nearestNeighborsTrainer.train(nearestNeighbors, trainingSet);
022
023        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : validationSet) {
024            Array<Float> estimate = nearestNeighbors.estimate(sample.features());
025            System.out.println("with noise = " + Array.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " estimated = " + Array.toString(estimate) + " real = " + Array.toString(sinus.getEstimationFunction().estimate(sample.features())));
026        }
027    }
028}
